article_title: Woman accused of drunken driving told police she was drinking while tubing with son, 7
article_text:

og.description: A 36-year-old woman arrested on suspicion of felony drunken driving early Sunday told Omaha police that she had been tubing and drinking on the Elkhorn River on Saturday with her 7-year-old son and his friend.
